title: hi my account is banned because i botted bots to level 30. is there a way to hard reset my account?
body: can riot reset my account please so i can just play again level 1 no botting? i like the username  and its linked to my email

replies.body: I'm sorry to tell you, but unfortunately, once your account is suspended, there isn't a way to get it back. You can, however, level up a new account, but the things you're requesting cannot be made available at this time. If you have any other questions, please feel free to ask!
You botted, its the same as scripting. No way you're getting that account back.
